pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Waterproof gloves; Shoes plus socks; NIOSH-approved particulate respirator with any R or P filter with NIOSH approval number prefix TC-84A or powered air purifying respirator with a HE filter with NIOSH approval number prefix TC-21C.

Active_Ingredients.name: Bacillus thuringiensis subsp. kurstaki, strain ABTS-351, fermentation solids, spores and insecticidal toxins

Safety_Information.general_Info: Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with eyes or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor, or going for treatment. You may also contact 1-877-315-9819 (24 hours) for emergency medical treatment and/or transport emergency information.
